description: A collection of circles in a triangular wedge-shaped formation with the point on the bottom attached to a circular formation of circles below; there is also a thin line of circles extending outwards from the right side of the circular formation. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a brown triangle at the top of the circular formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.

content: March 16, 2023. No walk in the park. #NYTVertex
